Posts.Content: Hello, I would like to hear from anybody if you have any experience personally or through your friends about the treatment of breast cancer in Hoxsey clinic. My cousin who is 44 and a mother of two has a breast cancer, she had a surgery, they removed a breast and she feels good now but I offer her to try some alternative treatment instead of chemo therapy. I read about Hoxsey clinic but never spoke to people who've been there. Please tell me if it's worth trying. Thank you, Tanya.
Posts.Title: Hoxsey clinic

Posts.Content: Thank you very much for your reply. May I ask how long ago your mother visited the clinic and what were her impressions of it ? Are there lots of people from other countries ? My sister is from Ukraine. And yes, please tell me the impressions of your father as well. I fish him to recover soon ! I am sure if he believes he will recover. You can write to me: ustinova at yahoo com. Thank you again. Tanya.
Posts.Title: Hoxsey clinic
